name: House of Rules
description:
'House of Rules' is a horror puzzle game inspired by the creepypastas based on rules. (known as Neapolitan Ghost Story)
Following the work rules, solve various puzzles and riddles to reveal the truth hidden in the mansion.

Synopsis


Searching for a place to work, you find an intriguing job advertisement offering an excessively high salary. Doubtful but desperate, you head to a mansion for a job interview to discover a surprisingly neat workplace, weird work rules, and suspicious co-workers. You get the job offer on the spot. Your work starts tomorrow.

Features


- Puzzles and riddles
- 20 Collectible endings
- Shocking twists
- Unique characters

Parody and Streaming Guide


1. House of Rules strictly bans game unpacking and game modification.
2. Fan art, cartoons, and parodies are allowed as long as the source is indicated, non-commercial, and does not damage the original.
3. It is forbidden to upload videos with only the endings.
4. Only live streaming is allowed for endings 19 and 20.

In other cases, please send a mail to the developer.
